name: Snail Traffic Control
description:
Snail Traffic Control

Welcome! You are the new snail traffic control officer. I know this sounds daunting, but fortunately Mr. Snailsworth is here to show you the ropes! 

Snails are restless creatures and you’ve got to keep them from crashing by placing arrows in front of them to change their direction.  Every 10 seconds, a new snail will land by drop pod and add to the chaos!

There are quite a few types of snails in this clutch so keep an eye on what each snail does. Can you survive this mollusc madness?

Controls 

Place Arrows - Click and drag Left Mouse Button

Remove Arrows - Right Click

Game Made By:

Russell Nairn, Pippa Hobbs and Matthew Sullivan

Game made for Ludum Dare 51

Theme: Every 10 Seconds
